description: Try our easy to follow Barbecue Sausages with Polenta & Tomatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sausage dishes,Sausage,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,BBQ,High protein,Soy free,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Barbecue Sausages with Polenta & Tomatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup continental parsley leaves, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a BBQ grill plate on medium heat. Cook sausages for 8 minutes, turning occasionally, until browned on all sides and cooked through.

Season tomatoes with salt and pepper. Add to hotplate, cut side down. Cook for 1 minute. Turn and cook for a further minute or until cooked through. Transfer sausages and tomatoes to a large plate. Cover to keep warm.

Bring chicken stock to the boil in a large deep saucepan. Add polenta in a slow steady stream, stirring constantly. Reduce heat to low and continue to stir for approximately 5 minutes or until bright yellow and grains are soft. Add butter, parmesan and parsley. Stir until combined. Spoon onto serving plates and top with sausages and tomatoes.
